name: INTER/FERENCE
description:
INTER/FERENCE

THERE IS NO SILENCE, THERE IS ONLY NOISE.
THERE IS NO FUTURE, THERE IS ONLY NOW.
THERE IS NO INPUT, THERE IS ONLY OUTPUT.
NOTE: We do not know the efficacy or safety of this device
NOTE: Wario's "mummy" was here.

Graphics and Sound by Steven Steffen
Code and Design by Julien Escobar

Adjust the volume and click the button
Click another button. Click the screen.
Listen. Laugh. Panic.
Destroy circles with same color circles.
You cannot spawn circles in stardust.
Protect the star for as long as you can.

Created for Global Game Jam 2022
